name: The Longest Night (Mirza Krnjic)
description:
Do you have what it takes to survive The Longest Night !?

The Longest Night is a survival horror FPS game meant as a challenge with a focus on in-game atmosphere and visuals, where the player has to use his resources wisely. The more time the player needs to finish his objective the more difficult the game becomes.

Story: Ada island has been under lockdown for 8 months where a new virus appeared. The island inhabitants have received food and supplies from the government but in the last month, no contact could be established. You (the player, a navy seal) go illegally to the island trying to save your daughter and wife. 

Controls :

Shoot - Left Click  

Aim - Right Click

Die - ragequit

Run away - W-A-S-D 

Run away faster - Lshift

Flashlight - F

Night-vision - N

Inventory - Q or I

Jump - space

Menu - ESC

Tips: 

Enemies are difficult to kill with body shots (always go for headshots).

Use 'Q' to access the inventory quickly.
